Title: This Might Sting
Description:
Relax. This Sundered Flame is merely poisoned. He won't die. Probably.

 He will just be in pain.

<Patroclosa looks at you, then sighs.>

I suppose if you wanted to spare him this fate, you could collect bile from the Quartzite Sporebats that roam this valley. It contains a natural antivenom that would ease his suffering. But I will not waste my healing magic on a murderer.

And you may as well bring back loamshrooms, to help him keep the bile down. Though it's a kindness he doesn't deserve.
ObjectivesText: Collect 8 Spongy Loamshrooms and 5 helpings of Quartzite Spore Bile.

Objectives.Text: Attempt to convince Patroclosa to apply the antivenom
